vclaim: The Black Panther Party created the Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) program that provides supplemental food assistance to single mothers and their children.
title: Did the Black Panthers Create the WIC Food Program?
subtitle: An Internet meme credited the Black Panther Party with inventing Women, Infants, and Children, a federal program that provides food assistance to impoverished mothers and children.
author: David Emery
